main.name: Farhan Khan
main.description: I am a web development engineer and I use react and vue.js to develop pages. This project is a resume template that can be used as the project home page or resume page

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Working on US client projects of Reactjs.Integrate designs and wireframes within the application code.Complete understamding of ReactJS and its fundamentals like JSX.Knowledge of CMS dashboard with their roles and functionality.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Understanding of how great design fuels an excellent user experience.Knowledge and proficiency with WordPress CMS.Demonstrable knowledge of front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS & JQuery.Working knowledge of MySQL databases.Ability to multitask while maintaining careful attention to detail.Ability to work effectively both individually and within a team environment
